triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The paper uses LLMs to automatically derive formal specifications from natural language input.

triples.name: Temporal logic
triples.relevance: The target formalization language that natural language is translated into for system specifications.

triples.name: Formal specification
triples.relevance: The core task is deriving formal specifications from unstructured natural language requirements.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: The paper addresses the bottleneck of manual formal specification creation for formal verification tasks.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The paper applies NLP techniques through LLMs to process and translate natural language requirements.

triples.name: Interactive machine translation
triples.relevance: The paper proposes an interactive approach where users iteratively add, delete, and edit sub-translations to resolve ambiguity in formal specification generation.
